gist.headline: Planting the first seeds
gist.blurb: The path to the garden is a little clearer now. We added a quick 3-step guide to help new developers find their footing.
gist.summary: Updated the main README with a streamlined 3-step onboarding guide for new contributors.
gist.impact: New developers can get their environment set up and start coding without the guesswork.
gist.visual_concept: A welcoming garden path. Polly the Bee standing next to a wooden signpost with three distinct arrows/boards, guiding the way for new visitors. Represents the 3-step onboarding guide.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot hovering next to a wooden garden signpost with three arrows. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. The bee wears a tiny tour guide hat. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
